resources.string: Sad face, you\'ve lost the game!!

string-array.name: game_rules_array
string-array.item: 1. The game is for one player.
2. A word is randomly chosen from predefined categories and displayed along with the category.
3. The word is displayed with the letters hidden.
5. The possible results of the “spinning the wheel” are: a number of points e.g 1000 or “bankrupt”.

6. In the event of a value being shown, a letter (consonant or vowel) is chosen by the user (from a keyboard or otherwise). If the letter is present, the user’s points total is incremented by the value shown times the number of occurrences of the letter. The occurrences of the letter are revealed in the word.
7. If the letter is not present the user loses a “life”.
8. In the event of “bankrupt” being shown, the user loses all their points.
9. The “wheel is spun” until the game is won or lost.
10. The game is won when all the letters have been found and the user still has a life.
